title: Project-Based Learning Strategies for Developing Critical Thinking Skills in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and research methodologies, experience with online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Development of critical thinking for in-service science professionals through real-time online collaboration and enhanced social interaction.

learning_goals: Learners will design and implement online PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects to solve real-world problems in science
Learners will apply critical thinking in collaborative problem-solving processes with peers using socially shared regulatory scaffolding strategies
Learners will evaluate and present project outcomes and improvement plans according to a structured feedback template
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
